sentences.en: A Saturn rocket hurled Apollo aloft.
sentences.cn: 一枚土星号火箭把阿波罗宇宙飞船送入空中.

sentences.en: Astronomers used to ask why only Saturn has rings.
sentences.cn: 天文学家们过去一直感到奇怪,为什么只有土星有光环.

sentences.en: Because Titan is Saturn's largest moon, it held special interest for us.
sentences.cn: 由于土卫六是最大的卫星, 因此我们对它特别感兴趣.

sentences.en: Each of the Saturn's three stages was fired on schedule.
sentences.cn: 土星火箭的三节,每节都按时发动了.

sentences.en: In 1988 we will be able to see Saturn's rings in their fullest glory.
sentences.cn: 到1988年,我们将会看到土星环最壮丽的景象.

sentences.en: Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune. Those are the gas giants, the four heavyweights of the solar system. But was there once a fifth?
sentences.cn: 木星，土星，天王星和海王星。这些都是气体行星，太阳系的四个重量级。但曾经存在第五个行星吗？

sentences.en: Numerical examples are mostly taken from studies of the Saturn V vehicle.
sentences.cn: 数值例子大多数取自“土星V”飞行器的研究.

sentences.en: On the right of the image, sunlight bathes the anti - Saturn side of this geologically active moon.
sentences.cn: 在右边的形象, 阳光的沐浴anti-Saturn这个地质活跃的月亮.

sentences.en: Remember earlier when we talked about Saturn and how he teaches us about karma, cause and effect, and "tough love" style life lessons.
sentences.cn: 记得早些时候曾当我们谈到土星，以及他如何讲授业，原因和影响我们，“严厉的爱”式的生活经验。

sentences.en: Saturn is the second biggest planet in the solar system.
sentences.cn: 土星是太阳系中的第二大行星。

sentences.en: Saturn was to launch the 15 th flight, a Moon orbital mission.
sentences.cn: 第15次飞行利用萨杜恩将飞船送人月球轨道.

sentences.en: She wrote important studies of the planets Jupiter and Saturn.
sentences.cn: 她写了几篇关于木星和土星的重要学术论文.

sentences.en: The booster was Saturn C - 3 and the key technique was lunar orbit rendezvous.
sentences.cn: 采用萨杜恩C -3 运载火箭,关键技术是月球轨道会合.

sentences.en: The Saturn family of launch vehicles falls into three types or groups.
sentences.cn: “土星族”飞行器可以分为三类或三组.

sentences.en: The Saturn I launch vehicles consisted of two types or blocks.
sentences.cn: “土星Ⅰ”发射飞行器包括两类或两个组合.

sentences.en: There are so many similarities in so many respects between Saturn and Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 土星和木星在许多方面有许多相似之处.

sentences.en: These comparisons suggested that Saturn is made of lighter materials.
sentences.cn: 这些比较告诉我们,土星由较轻的物质构成.

sentences.en: This was the primary reason for selecting the fin size for the Saturn Vehicle.
sentences.cn: 这就是“土星”飞行器安定面尺寸选择的主要依据.

trans.tran_cn: <天>土星，[罗史]农神，铅，（美国的）土星运载火箭
trans.tran_en: the planet that is sixth in order from the sun and is surrounded by large rings
